item.title: Hello World
item.description: hugo new posts/second.md will create a new post on the website and then hugo server will reflect that in the local host write the front matter manually as well if you want to create your own website commands hugo server -D and hugo server are same to deploy changes to original website use hugo -D go to public repo and commit and push changes from there to nishantb06.github.io repo to add images dont add them in static folder but use a url instead

item.title: About Me
item.description: Who am I Hi, my name is Nishant Bhansali. I’m working as a Machine Learning Engineer at Sharechat Contact Email - nishantbhansali80@gmail.com Why I build this blog keep a track of my learnings build a habit of writing regularly its cool to have a blog its cool to build it yourself Blog…about what? Here are some ideas: Reflections on my personal projects on GitHub What problem I solved What was the challenge How I tackled it What I’ve learned in the project Student Life Thoughts on lectures I take The examination phase!
